item.title: Here’s Where Drivers Suffer The Worst Traffic Congestion, Data Shows

item.title: How Kalshi’s Cofounder Went From Professional Ballerina To World’s Youngest Self-Made Woman Billionaire
item.description: A former ballerina and MIT computer science grad, 29-year-old Brazilian Luana Lopes Lara is now the world’s youngest self-made woman billionaire.
